RLV574

We Are Under Attack
short_description:
URGENT - We are under attack on YouTube. YouTube has removed the Real Life with Jack Hibbs channel. We are working to resolve this matter with YouTube, but candidly, they have not helped work toward a solution.

To maintain the content on the Calvary Chapel Chino Hills and Real Life with Jack Hibbs ESP channels, we have removed visibility to all of their content. We will let you know if and when we return to these channels.

In the meantime, you can watch our live streams and past sermons at calvarycch.org and jackhibbs.com. We will continue to live stream on Facebook. 

As always, thank you for your prayers and support!

When you allow yourself to be overtaken by worldly pleasures, your life will grow dim and empty. How do you stop this abuse of your spirit? The answer is simple: Know what God’s word says about you and embrace His sanctifying work in your life.

RLV490

short_description:
While the world pushes the narrative that truth is relative, irrefutable evidence proves this is false. Join Pastor Jack as he examines the Biblical and scientific grounds for absolute truth. The question is: are you willing to accept it?

RLV489

The Bible tells us we are made in God’s image and bear His moral likeness. Our ability to think, create, and imagine all come from Him. 
We invite you to search the Scriptures along with Pastor Jack to understand the mind and how it works.

Behold He Comes - Teaser

title: Why Is Sex & Sexuality So Important In Marriage?
short_description:
As the creator of marriage, God has set clear boundaries for sex in the marital relationship. With Christ’s love for the church being the ultimate example for marriage, we can see God’s perfect design in creating a ministry between husband and wife. 

RLV399

title: Our God-Given Sexual Identity – What’s The Big Deal?
short_description:
Now more than ever before, sexual makeup is a frequent topic of debate. The Bible, however, is very clear on the God-created differences between males and females. Join Pastor Jack in examining the role of sex in identity, as revealed in the Bible.

RLV398

title: Sex: America's New Religion
short_description: There’s no doubt about it – sex is worshipped in today’s culture. What does the Bible say about sex & sexuality? How can we, the church, defend the biblical view in this sex-saturated world? Join Pastor Jack in his discussion on this hot-topic issue.

title: Parable of the Hidden Treasures - Continued
short_description: Continuing the study of the Parable of the Hidden Treasures, we can clearly see how Christ values, desires, and welcomes us. He gave up everything – even His life – so that we could dwell in eternity with Him. Will you accept His invitation?

title: Parable of the Hidden Treasures
short_description: Knowing what Jesus thinks about you is a fundamental part of your relationship with Him. Join Pastor Jack in this study to learn how precious you are to Christ and about His immeasurable love and the sacrifice He made for you.

title: Heaven - Continued
short_description:
Christians across the globe are going through a time of great testing and trial. Yet heaven beckons to Jesus’ Bride as she’s being prepared for an eternity of joy with Him. Join Pastor Jack as he looks at the promise and hope of every believer… heaven.

RLV394

title: Heaven
short_description:
Just as God extends the invitation to heaven, He also invites us to know Him personally and lets us see, through His Word, what the future holds. Pastor Jack exhorts believers to be willing to look beyond the physical and turn their eyes to heaven. 

RLV393

title: Let's Go!
short_description:
What does it mean to “be ready” for Christ’s return? How can we be “living expectantly” in the last days? In this timely message, Pastor Jack exhorts believers to keep our love for God burning and be faithful disciples. Will you accept the challenge?

RLV392

title: Real Life_191218_Political Segment_Final
Are You Waiting?
short_description: Are you prepared to meet Jesus? Does the promise of His return bring you hope?  Pastor Jack challenges believers at the Southern California Men’s Conference to be people of faith, waiting and ready for Christ’s soon return.

title: The LGBTQ Movement - How Should The Christian Respond? - Part 2
short_description: The unbelieving world often accuses Christians of being “intolerant” and “hateful” towards the LGBTQ community. As ambassadors of Christ, how can we communicate His love & design to those stuck in the LGBTQ lifestyle?

title: The LGBTQ Movement - How Should The Christian Respond? - Part 1
short_description: The biblical truths of sexual orientation and gender identity are being re-written by the culture. Even some modern “Christian” movements are twisting scripture to embrace LGBTQ lifestyles. How can you stand for biblical truth on this issue?

title: Parable of The Two Gates & Two Ways - Part 2 Continued
short_description: The fruit of the spirit is evidence that one is living a Christian life. Pastor Jack exhorts believers to remain faithful by keeping their eyes fixed on heaven. Grab your Bible and get ready to be encouraged.

title: Parable of The Two Gates & Two Ways - Part 2
short_description:
Jesus never spoke vaguely about how to have eternal life. He made sure that His audience grasped the truth in ways that they could relate to and immediately understand. Join Pastor Jack as he unfolds Jesus’ parable concerning the path to heaven.

RLV387

title: Parable of The Two Gates & Two Ways - Part 1 Continued
short_description: With all of the opposing opinions on eternity, how can you know you’re on the right path to heaven? In this insightful teaching, Pastor Jack challenges listeners with the need to make the Bible their definitive guide on where they’ll spend eternity.

title: Parable Of The Two Gates And Two Ways - Part 1
short_description:
The gravity of the two paths that confront each of us requires thorough examination. How can you judge which is true and which is false? Join Pastor Jack for a clear and concise teaching on the elements of each road and their ultimate destiny.

RLV385

title: The Prophetic Church
short_description:
Christians need to know the marks of a prophetic church and how it impacts the world. In a message that will encourage and equip you, Pastor Jack points believers to the biblical signs of a growing church that is serious about advancing the kingdom.

RLV384

title: Let Parents Decide - Continued
short_description:
This special edition of Real Life tackles issues surrounding the attack on our children’s innocence in the classroom. You’ll want to watch this entire program as Pastor Jack dives into questions from a recent conference on the CA Comprehensive Sex Ed.

RLV383

title: Let Parents Decide - Part 1
short_description:
Impossible as it seems, there’s an agenda to indoctrinate our kids right under our noses. Shockingly pornographic curriculum is coming to a public school near you and you need to be informed. Join Pastor Jack and hear how it affects your community.

RLV382

title: The Baptism vs The Indwelling of the Holy Spirit
short_description:
The Holy Spirit has a powerful influence in the lives of believers and non-believers alike. Do you desire to understand His impact in your life? You won’t want to miss this clear and concise teaching by Pastor Jack, on the work of the Holy Spirit.

RLV381

title: Revival: What Is It And How Does It Happen?
short_description:
The Church needs a biblical revival if it’s to effectively impact the world in which we live. What sparks the flames of revival? It’s individual believers! Join Pastor Jack to hear how you can be a catalyst for change in your world and beyond.

RLV380

title: What You Believe About The Rapture and Why It Matters - Continued
short_description:
In Part 2 of this dynamic teaching on the Rapture, you’ll learn why it’s the Christian’s great hope along with biblical evidence that the Church will escape the Great Tribulation period. Join Pastor Jack to hear why the doctrine of the Rapture matters.

RLV379

title: What You Believe About The Rapture and Why It Matters
short_description:
The Bible’s absolutely clear there will be a Rapture. This exciting event often generates questions, but when armed with solid answers, believers can be ready with anticipation. Join Pastor Jack as he shares how the Rapture should affect your life.

RLV378

title: Faith On Fire - Part 3 Continued
short_description:
A faith on fire is one that’s been ignited. It’s a faith fueled by the Word of God, surrendered to His purpose, and that continues to burn brightly. It’s a faith that can’t be stopped! Join Pastor Jack as he concludes the mini-series, Faith on Fire.

RLV377

title: Faith On Fire - Part 3
short_description:
We all want to know that our life matters. The Christian who lives a no-holds-barred faith can be assured that his life won’t be forgotten. As Pastor Jack explores the example of the Apostle Paul, you’ll be inspired to live life to the fullest.

RLV376

title: Faith On Fire - Part 2 Continued
short_description:
How does a believer hold fast? How can we survive in today’s culture and thrive spiritually? Answer: God’s divine, supernaturally-packed Word provides everything we need. Grasp the power of His great treasure in this teaching by Pastor Jack.

RLV375

title: Faith On Fire - Part 2
short_description:
God’s dynamic Word has the power to touch and utterly transform the human heart by setting it aflame for His glory. Our faith should shine! Whether it’s ablaze or a flicker, join Pastor Jack to hear why your faith cannot be extinguished.

RLV374

title: Faith On Fire - Part 1 Continued
short_description:
On this week’s program, Pastor Jack continues his study of a fiery faith. We discover that the Christian is to be consumed by the things of God and shining brightly in this spiritually dark world. Ask yourself - do you have a faith on fire?

RLV373

title: Faith On Fire - Part 1
short_description:
The Christian faith is often likened to a fire – but what does that really mean? Pastor Jack dives into Philippians 2, making a connection between physical attributes of fire and our spiritual lives that will deepen your understanding of your faith. 

RLV372

title: Arriving - God’s plan regarding Israel and Zion - Continued
short_description:
On this week’s program, we look to Isaiah 62 to understand God’s love towards Israel, His chosen people. We discover that God has pre-ordained His beloved nation to be a watchman, declaring Christ’s nearing return as we enter into the last days.

RLV371

title: Arriving - God’s plan regarding Israel and Zion
short_description:
Throughout the Old Testament, we see the uniqueness of God's Relationship with the nation of Israel. As Pastor Jack teaches from Isaiah 62, he discusses the important role Israel will play in end time events as foretold in Bible prophecy.

RLV370

title: Jack Hibbs And Friends Talk About Bible Prophecy
short_description:
Does Bible prophecy freak you out? It doesn’t have to! On today’s program Pastor Jack and good friends Amir Tsarfati, Jan Markel and Barry Stagner talk prophecy, the rapture, the compromising church, deception, and the significance of current events. 

RLV369

title: Parable Of Persistent Prayer - Continued
short_description:
When it comes to prayer, let’s face it, it’s often neglected or even an afterthought. Yet Jesus encourages us to be persistent in our prayers - without ceasing. The Bible says He hears and will answer us. Have you talked with God today?

RLV368

title: The Parable of Persistent Prayer
short_description:
Have you ever felt like your prayers are falling on deaf ears? This week, Pastor Jack contrasts our human limitations with God’s heart of love. Unlike the world around us, God always hears us and encourages us to be persistent in our prayer life.

RLV367

title: Ep.001 | Abortion Debate Takes Center Stage | Real Life Talk 05-30-19
short_description:
Real Life Talk is a podcast platform where Jack addresses today's real life issues from a Biblical perspective. Today’s episode examines the “Heart Beat Bill”.
RLT001

title: Parable Of The Mustard Seed - Continued
short_description:
As we grow in our faith, we can sometimes become complacent, allowing bad motives to creep in. From this parable, Pastor Jack helps us understand good, God-produced, growth versus counterfeit growth that is not from the Lord.

RLV366

title: Parable of the Mustard Seed
short_description:
Join Pastor Jack this week as we look at the Parable of the Mustard Seed and how the Kingdom of Heaven is likened to it. The mustard seed starts out super small but eventually grows to a surprising size. How would you describe your growth? 

RLV365

title: Faith Founded Upon Fact - from the Steps to the Temple Mount
short_description:
As people read the Bible, some may question - Is that place actually real? Yes it is! Journey with Pastor Jack to Israel and sit with us on the steps to the Temple Mount. Open the Book of Acts as we see that our faith is truly founded upon fact!
RLV364

title: Turn Around At Home with Pastor Jack
short_description:
Join us as Pastor Jack explains from his and Lisa’s book, Turnaround At Home, how, no matter your personal background, you can provide a stronger spiritual legacy than you received. What will your kids say was the heritage you passed on to them?

RLV362

title: Why There Must Be A Pre-tribulation Rapture Of The Church - Continued
short_description:
Are you confused about ‘the Rapture?’ Is it different than the 2nd coming of Christ? Are there things that must happen prior to the Rapture taking place? In today’s program Pastor Jack seeks to help sort it all out. The question is . . . are you ready?

RLV361

title: The Authority and Reliability of the Bible - from the Caves at Qumran
short_description:
Join Pastor Jack in Israel at Qumran, where the Dead Sea scrolls were discovered. At this time of uncertainty in our world, many question what is true. However, from Qumran, we see that God has indeed preserved His Word and that it is reliable and true. 

RLV363

title: Why There Must Be A Pre-tribulation Rapture Of The Church
short_description:
When we talk about the Rapture, the debate isn’t if but when. When will Christ return for the Church? In today’s program Pastor Jack helps us understand the issue by looking carefully at God’s Word and the arguments for a Pre-tribulation timeframe. 

RLV360

title: What And Who Is The Anti-Christ - Continued
short_description:
In the last days, many will be deceived by the Antichrist, claiming to be God. Through him, untold destruction and persecution will occur. But the Bible says you can be delivered from all of that! Don’t be deceived - choose Jesus today! 

RLV359

title: What and Who is the Antichrist?
short_description:
Did you know that there are over 100 passages of Scripture that refer to the coming Antichrist? The question is, why should this be important to us today? This week Pastor Jack challenges us to consider the relevance of this aspect of Bible prophecy.

RLV358

title: With You Wherever You Go - Continued
short_description:
On this week’s program, Pastor Jack reminds believers of the reality of suffering and trials in this life. But he also reminds us that God is with us wherever we go and He allows us to go through hardships to bring us closer to Him.

RLV356

title: With You Wherever You Go
short_description:
On this week’s program, Pastor Jack shares a personal testimony of seeing God work through the hard seasons of life. He encourages fellow believers to trust in the Lord, as He will be faithful to carry you through the difficulties you face.

RLV356

title: Parable Of The Sower - Part 2 Continued
short_description:
In closing this mini-series, Pastor Jack warns believers of the dangers of allowing the cares of this world to choke out the work of God in their lives. Guarding against this means a careful examination of one’s personal devotion and public witness.

RLV355

title: Parable Of The Sower - Part 2
short_description:
On this week’s program, Pastor Jack discusses how trials and persecution will definitely come our way. The question is, how do you deal with them? Will you stand firm upon the truth of God’s Word or will you give in to the pressures of life?
RLV354

title: Parable Of The Sower - Part 1 - Continued
short_description:
The condition of our hearts is revealed in how we respond to the gospel. On this week’s look at the Parable of the Sower, Pastor Jack encourages us to take inventory of our hearts – where do you stand in your relationship with the Savior?

RLV353

title: Parable Of The Sower - Part 1
short_description:
Join us for the first installment of our new mini-series on the Parable of the Sower. Pastor Jack examines the motive and mission of salvation, as well as the command to preach the gospel to the ends of the earth.

RLV352

title: Who Told You That You Are Going To Heaven? - Part 4 Continued
short_description:
Have you publicly confessed your faith in Jesus Christ? In the final installment of this mini-series, Pastor Jack discusses our urgent need of salvation and the mark of one whose life is being transformed by the saving grace of God.

RLV351

title: Who Told You That You Are Going To Heaven? - Part 4
short_description:
Jesus Christ’s offering is sufficient for our salvation. However, this does not mean that we can live to please our flesh. Join us as Pastor Jack addresses Christ’s call to live a righteous and honest life before God. 

RLV350

title: Who Told You That You Are Going To Heaven? - Part 3 Continued
short_description:
Is your salvation secure? Or can you lose it? What if there’s no evidence that you’ve actually decided to follow Christ? On this week’s program, Pastor Jack discusses the true believer’s security in Christ and the proof they’re headed to heaven.

RLV349

title: Who Told You That You Are Going To Heaven - Part 3
short_description:
In Hebrews 6, the Bible warns us of the dangers of a wayward soul. On this week’s program, Pastor Jack highlights these symptoms as well as the internal and external transformation that takes place when a person commits their life to Christ.

RLV348

title: After I Say I Do - What's Next In My New Life In Christ?
short_description:
You’ve just started following Christ and you might be asking “what’s next?” What steps should you be taking to develop your new faith? Join us as Pastor Jack relates the stages of growth in your new life in Christ to those of a marriage relationship.

RLV347

title: Get Up And Grow On - Part 2
short_description:
Pastor Jack continues his study on the growth that takes place in a believer’s life. As we repent, reject sin, and choose to walk in obedience to God’s Word, we are being sanctified and becoming more like Christ. Are you experiencing this growth?

RLV346

title: Get Up And Grow On - Part 1
short_description:
God started the work of making us like Christ, and He is continuing a work in us through the Holy Spirit’s sanctifying power. Pastor Jack explains how one of the essential components to Christian living is a desire to honor and follow God’s Word.

RLV345

title: The Makings Of A Godly Man
short_description:
Masculinity is under attack. Does God say anything about being a provider or being strong? What about compassion? How about anger? What about a man’s integrity? Join us as Pastor Jack takes a look at what the Bible says about Godly character.

RLV344

title: God’s Prophetic Pulpit In The Last Days – Part 2
short_description:
In light of Jesus’ soon return for His church, today’s pulpits should be prayerful, expectant, fearless, prophetic and faithful.  Pastor Jack continues his teaching from the nation’s largest prophecy conference.

RLV343

title: God’s Prophetic Pulpit In The Last Days – Part 1
short_description:
The church should be the most influential presence in their communities, yet many of today’s pulpits have been comprised by a desire for popularity and attendance. Pastor Jack, at the nation’s largest prophecy conference, addresses the need for authentic and engaged pastors in today’s culture. 

RLV342

title: Where Is Your Hope?
short_description: Ever been in a place where hope seems lost? What are we, as believers, to do when life causes us to ask – Is there hope? The purpose of hope and our need for hope are both found in one place: God’s Word…our source of hope!

title: Who Told You That You Are Going To Heaven? - Part 2 Continued
short_description:
When you become a follower of Christ, the evidence of your salvation is the change in your lifestyle. Who you were before you knew Christ must be different from who you are now. Pastor Jack discusses this lifestyle change on this week’s program.

RLV340

title: Who Told You That You Are Going To Heaven? - Part 2
short_description:
On this week’s program, Pastor Jack discusses the unchanging power of the Gospel – it is the same yesterday as it is today. Christ alone made the way for Salvation! It is by His grace that He invites us to join Him in heaven.

RLV339

title: Why Is There Pain And Suffering?
short_description:
In light of the tragedies we’ve experienced lately, such as shootings and wildfires, some may ask why there is pain and suffering in the world. How does the Christian respond biblically? Pastor Jack explores answers to these questions.

RLV338

title: Who Told You That You Were Going To Heaven? - Part 1 Continued
short_description:
It is no secret that a false gospel is rising in today’s pulpits. Pastor Jack addresses the deception of false gospels, the narrow path of the true gospel, and God’s perfect way of salvation.

RLV337

title: Who Told You That You Are Going To Heaven? - Part 1
short_description:
On this week’s program, Pastor Jack begins this new mini-series by discussing the gospel and salvation. He highlights the dangers of self-righteousness and a false sense of security in our approach to heaven.

RLV336

title: Dealing With Depression And Thoughts Of Suicide
short_description:
Depression and Suicide: it’s all around us! For both Christian and non-Christian alike, the struggle with depression and suicidal thoughts is a huge issue in today’s culture. The question is: How do Christians deal with these struggles Biblically?

RLV335

title: The Believer's Hope
short_description:
The Feast of Trumpets, Yom Kippur, and the Feast of Tabernacles have great significance in Bible prophecy and end time events. Pastor Jack and Amir Tsarfati discuss this connection as well as the believer’s hope in awaiting the return of Christ.

RLV334

title: Special Report with Pastor Jack
short_description:
Pastor Jack askes the question: “Are you going to be using your blood-bought freedoms, provided to you by God, to vote in this coming election?”
Join Pastor Jack as he discusses the Biblical foundation for believers to be involved in cultural issues.

RLV333

title: Pastor Jack Interviews John Cox - Candidate for Governor
short_description:
Pastor Jack interviews Gubernatorial Candidate John Cox on his personal testimony and opinion of current political issues such as power in government, special interest groups, the use of resources, and the importance of voting.

RLV332

title: Why Should a Christian Be Involved In Cultural Issues?
short_description:
Pastor Jack discusses the Biblical foundation for believers to be involved in cultural issues. He highlights examples of Old Testament believers exercising influence in civil government as well as current issues worth fighting for in today’s culture.

RLV331

title: Parable Of Being The Salt - Continued
short_description:
The faithful obedience of a Christian includes being the “salt of the earth”. This week’s program highlights the influence of the Believer’s life on the world around him and his calling to be an effective witness for Christ. 

RLV330

title: Parable of Being The Salt
short_description:
In Luke 14, a comparison between salt and the Christian life is made. This parable highlights the Believer’s role as the “salt of the earth”, both purifying and preserving the world against the rotting effects of sin.

RLV329

title: Parable of the Ten Virgins - Part 3 Continued
short_description:
Pastor Jack concludes his study on the Parable of the Ten Virgins by exhorting the Christian to be ready and watching for Jesus Christ’s return. It could happen at any moment. Are you ready?

RLV328

title: Parable of the Ten Virgins – Part 3
short_description:
Living out your faith can be especially difficult when faced with the various trials of life. On this week’s program, Pastor Jack discusses how Christians act upon what they believe when their faith is tested.

RLV327

title: Parable of the Ten Virgins – Part 2 Continued
short_description:
Pastor Jack continues his study in this parable by looking at the Holy Spirit and His presence in our lives. When the Holy Spirit fills us and empowers us, Christian maturity and effective usefulness to God is the result.

RLV326

title: Parable of the Ten Virgins - Part 2
short_description:
On this week’s program, Pastor Jack addresses the question “how can we be ready to meet the Lord Jesus Christ?” by examining the source of our watchfulness: the Holy Spirit.

RLV325

title: Parable of the Ten Virgins – Part 1 Continued
short_description:
Expectation of Christ’s return is the main topic of discussion on this week’s program. Pastor Jack surveys the scriptures regarding the Rapture and the Second Coming of Christ, while also discussing the readiness of the Church.

RLV324

title: Parable of the Ten Virgins – Part 1
short_description:
On this week’s program, Pastor Jack begins his study on the Parable of the Ten Virgins. While examining this passage in Matthew 25, he discusses the importance of knowing God’s word and the prophecies found in the scriptures.

RLV323

title: All About Your Salvation – Q & A Continued
short_description: The conclusion of this mini-series continues with Pastor Jack discussing the following topics during a time of Q&A: the Christian who dies while in sin, Jesus as our Lord and Savior, and the presence of the Holy Spirit in the tribulation period.

title: All About Your Salvation – Q & A
short_description:
Pastor Jack concludes this mini-series on salvation with a time of questions and answers. Some topics of discussion include: assurance of salvation, faith and works, the rapture, the unpardonable sin, legalism, predestination, and foreknowledge.

RLV321

title: All About Your Salvation - Part 4 Continued
short_description:
Dealing with sin, sharing the gospel with others, and displaying Christ’s character are all important aspects of the Christian faith. On this week’s program, Pastor Jack examines how salvation produces these key aspects in a believer’s life.

RLV320

title: All About Your Salvation - Part 4
short_description:
The exploration of the doctrine of Salvation continues with a question: What happens to a Christian who dies in a backslidden condition? Pastor Jack discusses the expectant attitude believers should have while awaiting Christ’s return.
RLV319

title: All About Your Salvation - Part 3 Continued
short_description:
Through salvation, we are new creations in Christ and sealed by the Holy Spirit for eternity. That “eternal security” is by God’s grace alone - it cannot be done by our own efforts.

RLV318

title: All About Your Salvation - Part 3
short_description:
On this week’s program, God’s promise of salvation is examined. The Bible declares that God’s children have full assurance of salvation, meaning that believers cannot lose their salvation or be separated from God.

RLV317

title: All About Your Salvation - Part 2 Continued
short_description:
The discussion of salvation continues on this week’s program. Pastor Jack highlights the roles of baptism and holiness. Baptism is identified as a public display of salvation, while holiness is the inward transformation in the believer’s life.

RLV316

title: All About Your Salvation – Part 2
short_description:
Pastor Jack discusses a key requirement for salvation: repentance. While repentance leads to experiencing salvation and a restored relationship with God, unconfessed sin is a hindrance to our relationship with Him.

RLV315

title: All About Your Salvation – Part 1B Continued
short_description:
Pastor Jack continues his exploration of salvation by considering the role of faith. Salvation is received by faith alone and provided solely by Jesus Christ. Through Christ, we can know God and experience salvation!

RLV314

title: All About Your Salvation - Part 1B
short_description: On this week’s program, the relationship between salvation and grace is discussed. Pastor Jack expands upon the free gift of salvation and the transformation that takes place in our lives when we experience God’s grace.

title: All About Your Salvation - Part 1A Continued
short_description:
Pastor Jack continues his examination of the doctrine of Salvation by looking at how it is experienced in the believer’s life.  The Bible declares that salvation is a gift from God and is experienced by His grace alone, meaning the glory is all His!

RLV312

title: All About Your Salvation - Part 1A
short_description:
Salvation is widely regarded as the primary theme in Scripture. In the first installment of this mini-series, Pastor Jack discusses the doctrine of “Soteriology" and how we find it throughout the Word of God.

RLV311

title: Parable of the Prodigal - Q&A
short_description:
Pastor Jack takes time to answer listener’s questions about the Parable of the Prodigal Son. Why did the father give the inheritance to his son? What’s a good way to help your prodigal son or daughter? And many others.

RLV310

title: Parable of the Prodigal - Part 3 Continued
short_description:
In this final part of the series Pastor Jack talks about there being two sons in the story. Both sons were prodigals. One son is softened by the father’s love. The other son chose to be hardened. Which son’s example will you follow?

RLV309

title: Parable of the Prodigal - Part 3
short_description:
Join us as Pastor Jack helps us see the depth of God’s love. God hates sin. He hates us playing with it. He hates what it does to us. And, in His love for us, He devoted Himself to destroying it. Why? Because sin is what separates us from Him!

RLV308

title: Parable of the Prodigal - Part 2 Continued
short_description: In this program Pastor Jack helps us understand what it means to repent. The prodigal son realized he was not as great as he thought he was. In fact, he was stripped of what he thought was the answer to his life’s desires. “He came to himself.”

title: The Parable Of The Prodigal - Part 2
short_description:
In this portion of our series, Pastor Jack talks about authority. Ugh! Don’t we all hate that word? But, truthfully, we as human beings were never created to be without an authority over us. It’s God’s design.
RLV306 - Real Life TV

title: Parable Of The Prodigal - Part 1 Continued
short_description: Pastor Jack continues in his teaching on the Prodigal Son. What makes this parable so beloved? We will see it’s because it answers the deep and heartfelt need within us of forgiveness, redemption and restoration.

title: Parable of the Prodigal - Part 1
short_description:
Pastor Jack helps us understand the Parable of the Prodigal Son. Contrary to popular belief, this parable is not about a young man sinning himself into oblivion -  it is actually about the extravagance and lavishness of God’s love.

RLV304

title: How To Have The Peace Of God When – Part 4 Continued
short_description:
Pastor Jack concludes this mini-series on the peace of God by discussing how this peace is manifested in a Christian’s life. He examines the believer’s identity in Christ and determination to live out the Bible as key components of walking in peace. 

RLV303

title: How To Have The Peace Of God When – Part 4
short_description:
On this week’s program, the exploration of having the peace of God in many of life’s different situations is continued. Pastor Jack discusses the importance of seeking after truth and storing it in one’s heart for peace in every situation.

RLV302

title: How To Have The Peace Of God When – Part 3 Continued
short_description:
Pastor Jack continues in this mini-series with the discussion of having the peace of God when one’s mind becomes a battlefield. Meditation on things that are true, noble, and just is highlighted as a tool to obtain peace in a believer’s mind.

RLV301

title: How To Have The Peace Of God When – Part 3
short_description:
On this week’s program, Pastor Jack continues his exploration of the peace of God by examining the role of prayer. Prayer is highlighted as having great importance in the believers’ pursuit of allowing the peace of God to guard their hearts.

RLV300

title: How To Have The Peace Of God When – Part 2 Continued
short_description:
The examination of the peace of God in a believer’s life is continued on this week’s program. Pastor Jack discusses the role of peace in dispelling worry, trouble, fear, and discontentment in a believer’s life.

RLV299

title: How To Have The Peace Of God When – Part 2
short_description:
On this week’s program, Pastor Jack continues the discussion on the peace of God with the examination of Philippians 4. This passage highlights the importance of replacing worry with peace, producing joy as the result.

RLV298

title: How To Have The Peace Of God When – Part 1 Continued
short_description:
Pastor Jack continues the exploration of the peace of God by reminding believers of what they are and where they belong. God’s desire for peace in His children’s lives is highlighted through the examination of the scriptures.

RLV297

title: How To Have The Peace Of God When – Part 1
short_description:
On this week’s program, Pastor Jack presents the first installment of this mini-series on the peace of God. He begins this examination of the peace of God in a believer’s life by reminding the believer who he is according to God’s word.

RLV296

title: BEHOLD, Part 2   - Christmas Series with Jack Hibbs
short_description:
“Look Papa” is a common request that I hear a lot these days. As my little granddaughter discovers and experiences life at full speed, her eyes and fingers can scarcely take it all in. Everything has become to her the most fantastic thing ever. There is no greater pursuit or discovery than when a man, woman, boy or girl discovers the wonders of life and God is seen in the midst of it all. Behold means to “look, see, consider and regard.” Therefore, it is of utmost importance that we take the time to consider our God, His attributes and characteristics. He is worth taking the time to Behold. I’d like to encourage you to look at the greatness of God, which has been so graphically and wonderfully revealed to us in the Christmas story. Jesus Christ, the Son of God, came to us on Christmas Day some 2,000 years ago so that we would always know our great God in person. It’s my prayer that you Behold Jesus Christ, God’s gift to humanity.

short_description:
Over the last few years, Americans have been bombarded with one huge concept that can be summed up on one little word: change. Both political parties, and most Americans, recognize that major adjustments are needed in the economy, education, and health care. If one is to believe the political pundits, big changes are on the way. But few people are prepared for the change that many are predicting. A change they believe has been bearing down on the planet for 5,000 years, the colossal transformation of our solar system and our collective psyche that many believe will happen on December 21, 2012.       
RLV - #101

title: Pastor Jack on Knowing God
short_description:
You’re not here by accident. God loves you. He wants you to have a personal relationship with Him through Jesus, His Son. There is just one thing that separates you from God. That one thing is sin. Sin is our failure to measure up to God’s holiness and His righteous standards. The Bible says, “For all have sinned and come short of the glory of God.” Romans 3:23. We are all sinners. But there is good news for you! God loves you! And because of His great love, God sent His only Son Jesus to die for our sins, providing the way for you to have a personal relationship with Him.
 
“God demonstrates His own love for us in this: While we were still sinners, Christ died for us.” Romans 5:8

Jack Hibbs Interviews Wayne Grudem and Dinesh D'Souza
short_description:
The times that you and I are living in are truly amazing. The upcoming election will probably prove to be the most important in our lifetime. I would like to give you the information and tools that you need to know so that you might vote based upon your Biblical worldview. 
 
In this interview Pastor Jack Hibbs questions well-known author and theologian Dr. Wayne Grudem and Dinesh D’Souza, creator of the blockbuster documentary film “2016:Obama’s America”.
